textos_fuente.text: Heaton's: An Oceanfront Seafood Restaurant in Vero Beach Menu About Group Dining Events Press Gallery Reservations Instagram Open Menu Menu About Group Dining Events Press Gallery Reservations Instagram Heaton's on the ocean Steps from the sand, our oceanfront bar and grill brings the best of the Atlantic to your table. Sea breezes waft through our outdoor dining areas, where Chef crafts his seafood-focused menu of coastal fare and Lead Bartender Jacob Turner soothes and revives you with inventive cocktails and curated selection of beers, wines, and spirits. Grab lunch in the sun. Savor snacks by the pool. Linger over cocktails beside the crackling light of our firepit. Or sit down to views of the opulent Florida coastline setting the scene . Menus Sip a cocktail in the sun. Snack with friends as it sets. Stay for a meal by the firepit. Day or night, join us for chef-driven menus and thoughtful cocktails. Browse Menus Open daily 3500 Ocean Drive, Vero Beach, Florida 32963 VIEW EVENTS & SPECIALS Gallery The ocean sets the scene. We set the table. Our coastal menus channel our waterfront location and bring the sea to your plate. Check Us Out ' Phone: (772) 469-4444 General Inquiries: Info@heatonsverobeach.com Press Inquiries: Press@heatonsverobeach.com Heaton's HOURs Lunch Fri - Sun | 11AM - 3PM Happy Hour Daily | 3PM - 4PM Dinner Fri - Sat | 5PM - 9PM Bar (With Food Service) Daily | 11AM - 9PM Address 3500 Ocean Drive, Vero Beach, FL 32963 Park on us! Enjoy complimentary Valet Parking when dining at Cobalt or Heaton's. Valid for up to three hours. Heaton's will be closed for private events on 11/7, 11/15, 11/22, 12/5, 12/12. Happy Hour, Live Music & Events in Vero Beach | Heaton's Menu About Group Dining Events Press Gallery Reservations Instagram Open Menu Menu About Group Dining Events Press Gallery Reservations Instagram A Soundtrack for the Shore As lovers of live performances, Heaton’s frequently invites top local and regional musicians to join us, playing live at the edge of the ocean. Throughout the week, we invite you to explore our entertainment offerings, all of which allow you to step seamlessly from the warm sand into the cool sound of music. Live Music Schedule Select a date to check out what's happening. Featured Events Motown Halloween October 31 | 6:00pm - 9:00pm A Motown Halloween Party at Heaton’s featuring MR. MOTOWN Raffles | Giveaways | $250 Costume Contest Prize Reservations recommended. Reserve Your Spot Beach Bonfire November 8 Live Music 6:00pm - 9:00pm | Bar Until 11:00pm Enjoy food and drinks on the beach, plus a live performance by Easter Harbor. Hang out afterward for drink specials at Heaton's Bar until 11pm. Free event, no tickets required! ' Phone: (772) 469-4444 General Inquiries: Info@heatonsverobeach.com Press Inquiries: Press@heatonsverobeach.com Heaton's HOURs Lunch Fri - Sun | 11AM - 3PM Happy Hour Daily | 3PM - 4PM Dinner Fri - Sat | 5PM - 9PM Bar (With Food Service) Daily | 11AM - 9PM Address 3500 Ocean Drive, Vero Beach, FL 32963 Park on us! Tripadvisor’s approach to reviews Before posting, each Tripadvisor review goes through an automated tracking system, which collects information, answering the following questions: how, what, where and when. If the system detects something that potentially contradicts our community guidelines , the review is not published. When the system detects a problem, a review may be automatically rejected, sent to the reviewer for validation, or manually reviewed by our team of content specialists, who work 24/7 to maintain the quality of the reviews on our site. Our team checks each review posted on the site disputed by our community as not meeting our community guidelines . Learn more about our review moderation. Write a review Reviews are the subjective opinion of Tripadvisor members and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Go to the shop Switch skin Search for Home / Wine Dinners / chef’s table at Heaton’s Vero Beach Wine Dinners chef’s table at Heaton’s Vero Beach Thomas Miller Send an email 1,113 1 minute read Facebook X LinkedIn Pinterest Reddit Messenger Messenger WhatsApp Share via Email Print This past Wednesday, May 12th I hosted my first chef’s table wine dinner at the newly remodeled Heaton’s Vero Beach!  If you are not familiar with this restaurant & bar, it’s located at the Vero Beach Hotel & Spa and is adjacent to the swimming pool area.  A covered outdoor dining area with an automatic slatted room is one of the biggest changes you will notice from the old Heaton’s.  Chef Tom Dolan and his Culinary Team prepared a truly unique 4 course dinner with wines paired with each course.  Chef Tom came out in between each course to describe the dish.  Once again, they continue to impress me with not only the quality of their food, but the creativity with each dish served. Now let’s jump right in and see what this place has to offer and what I had to eat! Heaton’s Outdoor Dining Room – Photo Courtesy of Heaton’s Oceanfront View from my Table Buffalo Oysters – Maison Jaffelin, Brut Rose Pickled Peach and Fennel Salad – Feta cheese, red onion, bacon vinaigrette. Pork Belly and Apples – Farro, Sprouting Broccoli, Mushroom Demi. Prosciutto-Wrapped Snapper – Collards, Blue Corn Grit Cake, Pot Likker Cherry Cobbler – Served with Pecan Ice Cream Heaton’s Address : 3500 Ocean Dr, Vero Beach, FL 32963 Phone : (772) 469-1060 Hours of Operation : Monday – Sunday, 11:00am – 9:00pm https://heatonsverobeach.com/ Thomas Miller Send an email 1,113 1 minute read Facebook X LinkedIn Pinterest Reddit Messenger Messenger WhatsApp Share via Email Print Share Facebook X LinkedIn Pinterest Reddit WhatsApp Share via Email Print Thomas Miller Thomas Miller, known as “The Treasure Coast Foodie” and “The Foodie Guy,” is a celebrated food blogger, owner, and Editor in Chief of The Treasure Coast Foodie Blog, as well as the host and producer of Holy Grail Eats, where he spotlights one-of-a-kind restaurants and exceptional “Holy Grail” dishes. With ten years of experience, he has reviewed over 300 local restaurants, and his food photography captures the appetites of tens of thousands of followers each month. As the Official Foodie Insider for Visit Indian River County, Thomas champions local dining culture, sharing his insights with a loyal following of over 125,000. His expertise has also been featured in the luxe publication Coastal Drive Magazine. A Google Maps Level 8 Local Guide, Thomas has shared more than 4,000 photos, viewed over 100 million times, and his Foodie dining events rank among the Treasure Coast’s top culinary experiences. If you don't find what you're looking for, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team. Are you ISO accredited? Yes, we are ISO9001, ISO14001, ISO45001 accredited. You can view our certification here. What is your VAT number? GB392408345 What is your company registration number? Registered in England No. 1995153 I have only received part of my delivery, where is the rest? Please double check your delivery note, as the missing items may due to follow on. You can also check the progress of your order, line by line, when logged in online, within your dashboard. If you're confident you're missing a product that should have been delivered, contact our customer services team - You can email us on sales@heatons.net or call on 0333 999 0000. What if I want to return a product? You are free to return any stationery item, in its original, unmarked, undamaged packaging, within 10 days of delivery. Contact customer services at sales@heatons.net or call 0333 999 0000 arrange for the goods to be returned. Certain products may be subject to additional returns conditions beyond those already in force. Waterfront Vero Beach Restaurant on Ocean Drive | Heaton's Menu About Group Dining Events Press Gallery Reservations Instagram Open Menu Menu About Group Dining Events Press Gallery Reservations Instagram Seaside eats and oceanfront drinks Vero (Italian) adjective: “veh-ROH” – true If Vero Beach is the “true” beach of Florida’s Atlantic coast, then Heaton’s is its “true” oceanfront restaurant. Steps from the sand, we offer lunch and dinner daily, with  waterfront, sweeping ocean vistas by day, and a crackling firepit by night. Meet Our Team Jacob Turner, Lead Bartender Jacob Turner isn’t just a gin enthusiast – he’s a walking canvas. (No, really: ask him about his gin tattoo.) He brings unmistakable passion, along with a wealth of experience and a genuine love of hospitality, to Heaton’s and our sister restaurant Cobalt , where he develops and oversees our menus of craft cocktails, beers, wines, and spirits. A veteran of local favorite Southern Social, where he crafted an artful selection of house-made syrups, shrubs, and infusions, he is known among locals and regular visitors to Vero Beach alike for his boldly flavored, seasonal libations. His work in catering makes him a natural choice to design beverage menus for events of all sizes, and his warm presence behind the bar will make you feel instantly at ease, whether you are joining us for a hard-earned vacation or just a much-needed happy hour. Matt Lange, Executive Chef Matt Lange joins Kimpton Vero Beach Hotel & Spa as Executive Chef. Chef Matt honed his skills in hotel kitchens such as the Omni Orlando Hotel at Champions Gate, Rosen Shingle Creek, and Peabody Hotel Orlando. He even took to the seas as sous chef for Silversea Cruises LTD in the Baltic Sea. Following his European stint, Matt returned to solid ground to join the team at Michelin-starred NoMi Kitchen inside Park Hyatt Chicago. His four and a half year tenure at NoMi Kitchen influenced his culinary direction focusing on seasonal, refined American cooking. In 2015, he joined Loews Chicago Hotel, where he held various positions including Executive Sous Chef of the hotel. In late 2017, he was tapped to open the new concept LIVE! By Loews in St. Louis, located atop the famed Cardinals stadium. Chef Matt joined Kimpton Vero Beach Hotel & Spa in early 2022 and is excited to bring his commitment to quality to the resort’s menus. He applies many of the same methods to running a successful kitchen as he would a coach of a sports team. “I believe developing the culture is an extremely important element in the kitchen,” he explains. “It is what keeps the team excited, motivated, and generating quality dishes. I feel it is essential that everyone understands that it is a team effort and that collaboration is what makes a great kitchen.” When not in the kitchen, he can be found on the golf course perfecting his swing or fishing, or spending quality time with his family. Erin O'Keefe, Sommelier Erin O’Keefe is the new Sommelier at Kimpton Vero Beach Hotel & Spa. She oversees the wine program for the beachfront resort, Cobalt, and Heaton’s. Erin is creating a wine list that is welcoming to all and will transport you around the world. This program includes wines with little intervention, where the winemaker has allowed the terroir to shine in such a way that visiting Cobalt is a first-class seat to the best wineries. A rosé from Provence and the coastal breeze will leave you with the sensation of standing in a vineyard in the South of France; and a Brunello from Montalcino that will transport you to the sweeping countryside of Tuscany and make you wonder if those palm trees are actually cypress trees. Born in Petoskey, Michigan, Erin was introduced to the restaurant world in 2010 when she helped her mom open a family restaurant, The Twisted Olive. The coastal Mediterranean inspired restaurant was such a success it spurred the interest of Master Sommelier Ron Edwards who created one of Michigan’s most unique wine lists for them. Through his guidance and training Erin went on to get wine certifications and in the fall of 2017 Erin began an internship on a Champagne Vineyard in Charly-sur-Marne, France, Baron Fuente. She spent that fall in Champagne learning the ins and outs of production. During 2020 Erin took the opportunity to complete her Wine Spirit and Education Trust Level 2 certification through the Napa Valley Wine Academy and begin her own wine collection to make the most of having more time at home. She also started a blind tasting group, a skill that she is working on perfecting as part of her preparation for her WSET Level 3 certification. Wine lovers of all levels will enjoy the knowledge Erin has to offer. Marco Fanelli, General Manager General Manager Marco Fanelli oversees food and beverage across the Kimpton Vero Beach Hotel & Spa, bringing the same gracious hospitality of Heaton’s to our sister restaurant, Cobalt and our in-room dining program. His career has taken him from his family restaurant on Long Island to the University of Central Florida, where he studied Hospitality Management. Working with Marriott, the Ritz-Carlton and the Four Seasons taught him to make each experience unique and special, and prepared him to oversee our welcoming hotel and restaurants in picture-perfect Vero Beach. You’ll often see him at Heaton’s, checking in on your experience and working closely with his expert team to be sure that our food, drinks and service match our beautiful surroundings. Jeffret Gillespie, Assistant General Manager Jeffrey’s passion for food and beverage began in the city of brotherly love. Having studied hospitality management at Walnut Hill College, he took a job serving at Bibou BYOB that has accumulated accolades from the NYT, Philadelphia Inquirer, and allowed him to develop a knowledge of fine wine and elegant service. Jeffrey went on to open Le Cheri where he curated their beverage program and would guide neighborhood folks and oenophiles alike through the restaurant's impressive French & Swiss wine list. After Le Cheri, Jeffrey had the opportunity to reopen a newly renovated Bibou as General Manager. Here he was able to elevate the dining experience and refine the service to accentuate the new tasting menu concept and hone that knowledge of fine wine even more. Jeffrey joined the Kimpton Vero Beach Hotel and Spa family in April of 2022 as a restaurant manager overseeing both Cobalt and Heaton’s restaurants. Jeffrey has built a great relationship with the team around him and utilizes their strengths to best accommodate the guests. He has a hands-on approach to management and likes to lead by example. Outside of work Jeffrey loves to spend time on the golf course, the beach, and on the river in his kayak. Jeffrey has developed a palate for tequila and loves to sip on a nice reposado from time to time.
